alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet; Otero Mesa; Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet; West Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 02 at 10:58PM MST until February 03 at 11:00AM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of south central New Mexico and southwest Texas. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Thursday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow packed and potentially icy roads will create hazardous driving conditions. Significant travel delays will be possible.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet; Otero Mesa; Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet; West Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet
